message:
আমেরিকান সিনেটর জন ম্যাককেইন সরকারকে মিশরীয় সেনাবাহিনীর জন্য আর্থিক সহায়তা বন্ধের আহবান জানিয়েছেন

US Republican Senator John McCain calls on the US government to suspend financial aid to Egyptian army
Last modified: 6 Jul 2013 09:33

US Republican Senator John McCain has called on the US government to suspend financial aid to Egyptian army, following a military coup that has overthrown the elected president Mohammed Morsi.

"We have to suspend aid to Egyptian military because the military has overturned the vote of the people," McCain, who is also a member of the Senate’s Foreign Relations Committee, said.

"We cannot repeat the same mistakes that we made in other times of our history by supporting removal of freely elected governments."

McCain said that Washington should demand Egyptian army to set a timetable for elections and making of a new constitution. 

"And then we should evaluate whether to continue with aid or not," McCain said.
